document.docAuthor: Xue, Xiao-Feng, Song, Zi-Wei & Hong, Xiao-Yue
document.masterDocTitle: Six new species of Te t r a Keifer (Acari: Eriophyidae: Phyllocoptinae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Six new species of Te t r a Keifer (Acari: Eriophyidae: Phyllocoptinae) from China

heading.emphasis:
Key to the species of
Tetra
from China

paragraph.keyLead:
4 Coxal area without prosternal apodeme
........................................................ Tetra similisforca
Huang, 2001

6 Admedian lines on prodorsal shield separate
.................................... Tetra acerii
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006

7 Admedian lines on prodorsal shield connected at basal 2 / 3
.................................. Tetra toona
Huang, 2001

- Admedian lines on prodorsal shield connected at base
................. Tetra sorbusis
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006

8 Shield design with median line separate from admedian lines
.......... Tetra lucidi
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006
- Shield design with median line connected with admedian lines ................................................................. 9

9 Shield design with median line 1 / 3 anterior, female genital coverflap with 8 to 10 longitudinal ridges ......
..................................................................................................... Tetra guiyangensis
Kuang & Hong, 1989

10 Femur I and II with longitudinal lines
............................................. Tetra polygoni
Wei, Chen & Xie, 2003

11 Dorsal annuli with spiny microtubercles laterally
......................... Tetra smilaxis
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006

12 Admedian and submedian lines separate
..................................... Tetra clerodendri
Wei, Chen & Xie, 2003

- Admedian and submedian lines connected
.......................................... Tetra sinicae
Li, Wei & Wang, 2006

16 Female
genital coverflap smooth
...................................................... Tetra dalbergiae
Kuang & Zhuo, 1989

18 Solenidion knobbed, dorsal annuli with elliptical microtubercles on rear annular margins..........................
.......................................................................................................... Tetra salixis
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006

- Solenidion tapered, dorsal annuli with elliptical microtubercles ahead of rear annular margins..................
............................................................................................................... Tetra japonicae
Xue & Hong, 2005

20 Coxal area with granules, solenidion unknobbed
...................... Tetra ningshanis
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006
- Median, admedian and submedian lines normal, dorsal annuli with distinct microtubercles ................... 22

23 Prodorsal shield design indistinct, coxal area with short lines
...... Tetra cuihuae
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006

- Prodorsal shield design distinct, coxal area with short lines and granules
............... Tetra zhouzhis
sp. nov.
25 Admedian and submedian lines connected, coxal area with granules....................................................... 26

26 Median and admedian lines separate
...................................................................... Tetra actinidiae
sp. nov.

- Median and admedian lines connected
................................................. Tetra suspensae
Xue & Hong, 2005

28 Shield design with complete median line
.............................................. Tetra formosae
Xue & Hong, 2005

- Median and admedian lines separate
................................................. Tetra superbae
Huang & Wang, 2004

30 Admedian and submedian lines separate
.................................................................. Tetra sinicusis
sp. nov.

- Admedian and submedian lines connected
............................................... Tetra lobatae
Xue & Hong, 2005

31 Prodorsal shield smooth
........................................................... Tetra louguantais
Xue, Song & Hong, 2006

35 Prodorsal shield without median line at base ...
Tetra gleditsiae Kuang & Luo
; Kuang, Luo & Wang, 2005

36 Female
genital coverflap with 3 transverse lines each side at base and 5 to 8 longitudinal ridges, median line connected with admedian lines at base, central and anterior
....................... Tetra cleomis
Kuang, 1991

- Female genital coverflap with 8 longitudinal ridges, median line connected with admedian lines at base ..
............................................................................................................. Tetra lycopersici
Xue & Hong, 2005

37 Coxal area without prosternal apodeme
........................................... Tetra lushuiensis
Kuang & Hong, 1989

38 Empodium 6 -rayed, submedian lines present
............................ Tetra nanjingensis
Lin, Jin & Kuang, 1997
